journey.title: My Journey
journey.description: I am a Computer Science student with a solid background in Agronomy and Entomology, focusing on ecotoxicology and biological control. I am transitioning into IT with an emphasis on data analysis and software development. My work bridges scientific research with technology, using languages like C, C++, Java, Python, and Kotlin, and frameworks such as React, React Native, and Node.js. I seek internship opportunities where I can apply these skills in both local and international settings.

computerScience.title: Computer Science

agronomy.title: B.S. in Agronomy
agronomy.description: Specialized in pest management and development of agricultural products
